summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3072, for the improvement of East Fifty-fourth Street, from the end of existing trunk sewer at Twenty-sixth Avenue Northeast to Thirtieth Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37278 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
